EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-04-13-AWS Marketplace Promo.EMAIL-AWS Marketplace
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing VMTurbo for Multi-Clouds | 14 Days from AWS Marketplace
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
No Matter The Cloud, We Keep You In Control. Introducing VMTurbo For Multi-Cloud Environments Free for 14 Days
Get StartedL
<[[https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/pp/B010TWIRJO/ref=sp_mpg_product_title?ie=UTF8&sr=0-2]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
It’s a multi-cloud world. Gone are the days of only-on-premises deployments. You want to run Any Workload on Any Cloud, Anytime, Anywhere. You want them to run cheap, and you need them to run fast.
That’s why VMTurbo has partnered with Amazon Web Services to offer VMTurbo for multi-cloud environments <[[https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/pp/B010TWIRJO/ref=sp_mpg_product_title?ie=UTF8&sr=0-2]]>, helping you minimize AWS bills without sacrificing performance.
Benefits
- Control the performance of Any Application running on:
- Amazon Web Services - Microsoft Azure - IBM Softlayer - Your Own Private Data Center
- Minimize Public Cloud bills without sacrificing performance - Gain visibility into workload performance, resource consumption, and more - Create custom dashboards for yourself, your teams, and end users
- All this and more in just 30 minutes!
Try It Free for 14 Days <[[https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/pp/B010TWIRJO/ref=sp_mpg_product_title?ie=UTF8&sr=0-2]]> - The VMTurbo Team
